version_description:
* New (full) course - Erin Hills: Full. 18. Holes. Compete now in the 2017 Virtual U.S. Open (good timing, huh?) for a chance to win a trip to next year's U.S. Open!
* Bonjour, hola, hallo: WGT is now available in French, Spanish and German for our amis, amigos and freunde!
* Golf's better with friends: Invite your friends to join you here and you both get free stuff
* Level up faster with more XP by watching new videos after games

* New (full) course - Erin Hills: Full. 18. Holes. Compete now in the 2017 Virtual U.S. Open (good timing, huh?) for a chance to win a trip to next year's U.S. Open!
* Bonjour, hola, hallo: WGT is now available in French, Spanish and German for our amis, amigos and freunde!
* Golf's better with friends: Invite your friends to join you here and you both get free stuff
* Level up faster with more XP by watching new videos after games

* Custom Avatars (!!!) - You asked and we listened, now you can choose what your avatar looks like, including skin color, hair style and color, and face shape. It’s a whole new you!
* Light up your game with new Fireworks and Inferno Balls, to see sparks fly or your shots on fire!
* Something Awesome - [Insert mysterious, shameless tease about something awesome, coming soon...]

* Custom Avatars (!!!) - You asked and we listened, now you can choose what your avatar looks like, including skin color, hair style and color, and face shape. It’s a whole new you!
* Light up your game with new Fireworks and Inferno Balls, to see sparks fly or your shots on fire!
* Something Awesome - [Insert mysterious, shameless tease about something awesome, coming soon...]
Squashed a few pesky bugs!
Squashed a few pesky bugs!

* Upgrade to Premier: Buy a new Premier Membership and get these upgraded game play benefits for a whole year!
* Double XP for all games played
* Carry up to 4 country club passes at a time
* Extended 48 hour equipment rentals
* Free daily scratcher
* MAX Platinum: MAXimize your game with new, top-performing MAX balls for players at any level
* Nike Super Vapor: Player-favorite Nike balls with enhanced vapor trails to make your game super too

* Upgrade to Premier: Buy a new Premier Membership and get these upgraded game play benefits for a whole year!
* Double XP for all games played
* Carry up to 4 country club passes at a time
* Extended 48 hour equipment rentals
* Free daily scratcher
* MAX Platinum: MAXimize your game with new, top-performing MAX balls for players at any level
* Nike Super Vapor: Player-favorite Nike balls with enhanced vapor trails to make your game super too

* Customize Your Look - Introducing new golf apparel you can mix and match to represent your style from head to toe. Choose from hats, gloves, shirts, pants and shoes -- with over 3 million combinations (3.2M to be exact) there's a unique look for everyone.
* But wait, there's more! This new apparel ALSO improves your game stats and help you drive farther, putt better, level up faster and more.
* Custom Avatars (!!!) - We want you to be you on the course, so choose what your avatar looks like, including skin color, hair style and color, and face shape, then dress them up (see above).

* Customize Your Look - Introducing new golf apparel you can mix and match to represent your style from head to toe. Choose from hats, gloves, shirts, pants and shoes -- with over 3 million combinations (3.2M to be exact) there's a unique look for everyone.
* But wait, there's more! This new apparel ALSO improves your game stats and help you drive farther, putt better, level up faster and more.
* Custom Avatars (!!!) - We want you to be you on the course, so choose what your avatar looks like, including skin color, hair style and color, and face shape, then dress them up (see above).

Squashed a couple of bugs, including the Clayton & Mills sponsorship not unlocking!

Also new:
* Customize Your Look - Introducing new golf apparel you can mix and match to represent your style from head to toe. Choose from hats, gloves, shirts, pants and shoes -- with over 3 million combinations (3.2M to be exact) there's a unique look for everyone.
* But wait, there's more! This new apparel ALSO improves your game stats and help you drive farther, putt better, level up faster and more.

Squashed a couple of bugs, including the Clayton & Mills sponsorship not unlocking!

Also new:
* Customize Your Look - Introducing new golf apparel you can mix and match to represent your style from head to toe. Choose from hats, gloves, shirts, pants and shoes -- with over 3 million combinations (3.2M to be exact) there's a unique look for everyone.
* But wait, there's more! This new apparel ALSO improves your game stats and help you drive farther, putt better, level up faster and more.
Squashed a few pesky bugs!
Squashed a few pesky bugs!

- Daily Apparel Items - Each day we'll feature a different Apparel item that's available to buy individually, so be sure to check in often so you don't miss out!
- Ben Hogan PTx Irons - First virtual equipment from Ben Hogan, consistent performance for your game.
- Special Effects - Who doesn't love special effects? We've taken the sounds and special vapor trails from your favorite WGT golf balls that you can now apply to ANY virtual ball you have equipped (we're talking hearts, snow, fireworks and more).
- Gobble, Gobble! Try out (or gift) the new Turkey Ball for some seasonal flavor, just watch out for flying feathers...

- Daily Apparel Items - Each day we'll feature a different Apparel item that's available to buy individually, so be sure to check in often so you don't miss out!
- Ben Hogan PTx Irons - First virtual equipment from Ben Hogan, consistent performance for your game.
- Special Effects - Who doesn't love special effects? We've taken the sounds and special vapor trails from your favorite WGT golf balls that you can now apply to ANY virtual ball you have equipped (we're talking hearts, snow, fireworks and more).
- Gobble, Gobble! Try out (or gift) the new Turkey Ball for some seasonal flavor, just watch out for flying feathers...

A couple of bug fixes:
- A few users reported receiving the wrong amount of coins after a multiplayer game... Well don't fret! It has been resolved.
- Receiving an invite while already in a game was causing some overlay issues. Fixed!

A couple of bug fixes:
- A few users reported receiving the wrong amount of coins after a multiplayer game... Well don't fret! It has been resolved.
- Receiving an invite while already in a game was causing some overlay issues. Fixed!

* 10th Anniversary Virtual U.S. Open - The celebration of 10 years as host of the Virtual U.S. Open continues on the special new course, play the Back 9 Challenge starting April 1
* Cobra Clubs and SeeMore Putters - See all the new clubs in the Pro Shop now
* Spring is Here - Mark the season change with the new Spring Ball Effect, adding flowers and birds chirping to all your shots

- More Games + More Coins - Play new, quick one-hole games to earn more coins
- Tis the Season - For "ugly" holiday apparel, a Snowman head (obviously) and new Jingle Ball Effect, all for a limited time only!
- Weekly Bonus - Win coin games, earn free rewards
- Swing Meter Stats - Improve your swing with new info on when you're hitting too early, too late or just right (...on time)

* 10th Anniversary Virtual U.S. Open - The celebration of 10 years as host of the Virtual U.S. Open continues on the special new course, play the Back 9 Challenge starting April 1
* Cobra Clubs and SeeMore Putters - See all the new clubs in the Pro Shop now
* Spring is Here - Mark the season change with the new Spring Ball Effect, adding flowers and birds chirping to all your shots

- More Games + More Coins - Play new, quick one-hole games to earn more coins
- Tis the Season - For "ugly" holiday apparel, a Snowman head (obviously) and new Jingle Ball Effect, all for a limited time only!
- Weekly Bonus - Win coin games, earn free rewards
- Swing Meter Stats - Improve your swing with new info on when you're hitting too early, too late or just right (...on time)

Some minor bug fixes to make your experience better!
- fixed visual issue with some apparel packs
- several performance improvements

Some minor bug fixes to make your experience better!
- fixed visual issue with some apparel packs
- several performance improvements

- Rare and Epic Gear Coming Soon - Keep an eye out for new apparel items that are harder to find, but majorly elevate your game and style
- More 3 and 9-Hole Games - We heard you (loudly), so we’ve added more 3 and 9-hole Coin games PLUS two new rooms
- Show Your Colors - With the new Country Flag Ball Effect, select your country and your vapor trail will fly your flag’s colors!

- Rare and Epic Gear Coming Soon - Keep an eye out for new apparel items that are harder to find, but majorly elevate your game and style
- More 3 and 9-Hole Games - We heard you (loudly), so we’ve added more 3 and 9-hole Coin games PLUS two new rooms
- Show Your Colors - With the new Country Flag Ball Effect, select your country and your vapor trail will fly your flag’s colors!

A few small improvements and fixes:
- Rare and Epic apparel display the correct upgrade costs
- Multiplayer Coin Room screen now defaults the view to the last room you played in
- No longer have to re-select your ball effects each game

A few small improvements and fixes:
- Rare and Epic apparel display the correct upgrade costs
- Multiplayer Coin Room screen now defaults the view to the last room you played in
- No longer have to re-select your ball effects each game
Fixed a crash for iOS 10 users when opening a sponsor pack.
Fixed a crash for iOS 10 users when opening a sponsor pack.

* 10th Anniversary Virtual U.S. Open - We're celebrating 10 years of hosting the Virtual U.S. Open with a special new course this year, play the Front 9 Challenge now
* Lucky Leprechaun Hat - Get your avatar in the St. Patrick's Day spirit with this new hat, in the Pro Shop for a limited time!
* Improved Swing Training - Learn how to swing and putt better with our improved training

- Some new players were hitting a UI bug during Swing Training
- Certain devices were crashing occasionally due to a rendering issue

* TITLEIST - This legendary name in golf is now available on WGT for the first time ever, with virtual Pro V1 and Pro V1x golf balls in the Pro Shop!
* 10th Anniversary Virtual U.S. Open Main Event - The celebration of 10 years as host of the Virtual U.S. Open continues on the special new course, play the Qualifier starting May 1 with a chance to win a grand prize trip to the 2019 U.S. Open
* TaylorMade - New golf balls available now in the Pro Shop

* TITLEIST - This legendary name in golf is now available on WGT for the first time ever, with virtual Pro V1 and Pro V1x golf balls in the Pro Shop!

iPhone X Support - Hey iPhone X users, we've optimized the display for your larger screen so you can enjoy even more of your favorite courses
iPhone X Support - Hey iPhone X users, we've optimized the display for your larger screen so you can enjoy even more of your favorite courses

- Titleist - But wait, there's more! The Pro Shop now features a full line of premium Titleist clubs for the first time, that are unlocked now for all players
- Premium Titleist Bundle - Fastest, easiest way to fill up your virtual golf bag with all the new Titleist equipment, including golf balls and clubs
- Pro Shop Makeover - We've upgraded the Pro Shop to make it easier for you to upgrade your game, with new features like smart recommendations and filtering
- 10th Anniversary Virtual U.S. Open Main Event - The celebration of 10 years hosting the Virtual U.S. Open continues on the special new course, play the Qualifier in June with a chance to win a grand prize trip to the 2019 U.S. Open

* We've gone Rogue - See all the new Callaway Rogue clubs in the Pro Shop, including new drivers, irons and more!
* Pro Shop Makeover - We're continuing to make the Pro Shop easier for you to use and find the best gear for your game
* Additional bug fixes and improvements

Virtual U.S. Amateur Coming Soon - Starting Aug 1, compete in the first-ever Virtual U.S. Amateur tournament in an all-new format!
Virtual U.S. Amateur Coming Soon - Starting Aug 1, compete in the first-ever Virtual U.S. Amateur tournament in an all-new format!

* Help Grant More Wishes - We’re donating $1 for every new Make-A-Wish ball or ball effect purchase for Wish Month
* Virtual U.S. Amateur - Compete in the first ever Virtual U.S. Amateur, featuring a new format with a qualifying round and live championship!
* Flash Sales and Recommendations - Check out the Pro Shop to see equipment recommendations and any active flash sales
* Bug Fixes and Improvements - Many of these, including the one about the disappearing flagstick on some courses

A few minor bug fixes and improvements
Customize your golfer! Now you can equip apparel for in-game stats, but choose different apparel for your avatar to wear.
Customize your golfer! Now you can equip apparel for in-game stats, but choose different apparel for your avatar to wear.
A few small improvements to improve your golf experience!
A few small improvements to improve your golf experience!

* Coming soon: Quicker multiplayer games! Your game will end as soon as there's a guaranteed winner.
* Halloweeeeeeeen apparel items in the Pro Shop! Get in the spooky spirit with our Creepy Pumpkin Head and Scary Hockey Mask.
* Add a flying bat vapor trail and a cackle from our in-house witch to your shots with the limited time Halloween ball effect, heeeheheehee

* Coming soon: Quicker multiplayer games! Your game will end as soon as there's a guaranteed winner.
* Halloweeeeeeeen apparel items in the Pro Shop! Get in the spooky spirit with our Creepy Pumpkin Head and Scary Hockey Mask.
* Add a flying bat vapor trail and a cackle from our in-house witch to your shots with the limited time Halloween ball effect, heeeheheehee

* Updated “My Equipment” to better manage the equipment in your golf bag
* Unwrap a new course this December when Wolf Creek is launched as a full 18 stroke play course
* We've added some special holiday apparel items to spruce up your avatar, including Elf Shoes, Santa Hats and Party Pants!

* Updated “My Equipment” to better manage the equipment in your golf bag
* Unwrap a new course this December when Wolf Creek is launched as a full 18 stroke play course
* We've added some special holiday apparel items to spruce up your avatar, including Elf Shoes, Santa Hats and Party Pants!

* NEW COURSE - As promised, all 18 holes of Wolf Creek are available now in full stroke play!
* Festive Apparel - Get holiday-ready with limited time items, including Snowman Heads, Elf Shoes, Santa Hats and Party Pants
* Bug Fixes and Improvements - Checked off a list of these, including advanced equipment settings reverting to normal (not cool)

* NEW COURSE - As promised, all 18 holes of Wolf Creek are available now in full stroke play!
* Festive Apparel - Get holiday-ready with limited time items, including Snowman Heads, Elf Shoes, Santa Hats and Party Pants
* Bug Fixes and Improvements - Checked off a list of these, including advanced equipment settings reverting to normal (not cool)

The main menu has a brand new look! Here are some highlights:
* Game Modes - Find all the game types available to you, all. in. one. place.
* Settings - Look for the gear icon in the lower right, this is where your account info has moved to be with your settings (same as before)
* Daily Bonus - This new section is where to find your inbox, daily spins, scratchers and consecutive day bonus tracking

Plus, MORE stability improvements and bug fixes

* Aloha Manele! Play the Challenge at Manele course, a 9-hole closest-to-the-hole challenge to put you in a Hawaiian island mood 
* Update Avatars and Apparel - Now you can edit both from the same screen 
* Stability improvements and bug fixes

* Compete in the new head-to-head room to win 180,000 coins
* Callaway Epic Flash Driver - For epic shots off the tee
* Special edition Spieth 3 shoes from Under Armour
* Additional bug fixes and improvements

* Free Shirts! Celebrate the Year of the Pig with two new shirts in the Pro Shop for Chinese New Year
* Tuxedo Shirts! Your Valentine’s Day outfit is now available in the Pro Shop for a limited time
* Additional bug fixes and improvements
